Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Richmar
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for the dual sim and have no regrets. It is very convenient as I use two different networks, each sim card is immediately recognised by the phone, and I have no problem switching from one network to the next. I love the size and style. wish it came with usb, but I can't complain, I got what I paid for. Great phone, lots of features.

Reviews.Title: No Reception
Reviews.Author: Jeshua David Screws
Reviews.Content: Got the phone and really liked how it worked and all the functions. It was easy to use and had a qwerty key pad. However, the phone lost reception and never got it back in less then a day. Tried everything I could to reconnect the reception, but to no avail.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad but sadly it doesn't work well and the material is kind of cheap ... N too small as welllMaybe for someone else

Reviews.Title: like the item
Reviews.Author: L. Hield
Reviews.Content: was given as a gift to my sister and she is very happy with it, easy to use and fun

Reviews.Title: MR CHAT
Reviews.Author: Patrick Griffiths
Reviews.Content: I LOVE EVERY THING THAT IT DOES. THIS LITTLE PHONE IS FULLY FUNCTIONAL.THIS IS THE BEST DUAL SIM CELLPHONE I HAVE SEEN.I HAVE NO PROBLEM WITH IT.WORTH EVERY DOLLER.GO AND GET 1 NOW.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Maria Bathan
Reviews.Content: This phone does not reconnect automatically after you loose your signal when you enter a tunnel or go inside a building. You have to remove and replace chip to get signal back.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.2-Inch TFT-LCD Display
QWERTY
Dual SIM
FM Radio/ FM Recording
MP4/MP3
